name: Goodnight (Moziak)
description:
Dear Diary, Today's dream was interesting.
It felt like a dream inside a dream, I didn't know what was real anymore.
Everything felt real for a long while until Mom showed up. I thought she left a long time ago. It was weird seeing her again. I was alone with my dad for so long, I forgot what it was like to have a mother. But she was different... she was colder.... When I realised what was going on I- I woke up

           V2hhdCBpcyBldmVuIHJlYWwgYXQgdGhpcyBwb2ludD8=

------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

W: Move Forward

A: Move Left

S: Move Backwards

D: Move Right

Z: Interact Key

X: Inventory Key

------------------------------------------------------------------

The Plan

The game has not been fully released yet instead of having a trailer and letting you wait for years I plan to release smaller demos for you to play. Hopefully I will be able to keep up with the demand...

------------------------------------------------------------------

Inspiration

This game is heavily inspired by the RPG Maker game Yume Nikki with elements of Undertale and Omori.

bW9t
